summary: Clarified questions, hosted office hours, and had weekly meetings with the teaching team for first year students.
Created a cleaner package to remove unused OS release artifacts, saving storage and money.
Lead a team of 7 in completing tasks for the in-house competition portal.
Assisted with chatbot handoff to live agent process, and resolved high priority, client impacting bugs.
Managed mentor and mentee pair up for first years, and hosted social events.
Assisted in enhancing the UI and frontend system of the competition portal.
Entrusted with admin rights to assist with technology onboarding and resolving user incidents.
First work term on the Innovation team, working with chat bots and diagnostic tools.
3 week bootcamp on HTML, CSS, JS, and Python with 30 peers and Google engineers.
